ca.concordia.lanterns.exchange.impl.helper

Class DedicationThreat

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.lanterns.exchange.impl.helper.DedicationThreat

  • public class DedicationThreat
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a threat/possibility of some Player making a dedication in near future.

    A Player is said to threaten a dedication if it requires exactly one more Lantern card to make the dedication of some type

    Author:
    par_pat

      • getThreat

        public static DedicationThreat getThreat(DedicationType dedicationType,
                                         Player player,
                                         Game game)
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if the player has a possibility of making a dedication of type dedicationType in the near future.
        Parameters:
        dedicationType - - Type of dedication that should be checked
        player - - The player in who could make the dedication
        game - - The game in context
        Returns:
        DedicationThreat - If the player do threaten a dedication of type dedicationType, null -otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
